title: Henderson police search for clues after two shot Thursday night
content:
Henderson Police were combing the area around Metzger's Tavern in Henderson after a shooting near there sent two men to Methodist Hospital.
A 911 call brought police to the area just after 9 p.m. Thursday night. Neighbors in the area reported hearing as many as nine shots in rapid succession.
Officers were searching a large swath of Powell St., hoping to piece together what exactly happened. Details were very sparse as police cordoned off two separate areas on Powell St., and an officer on scene could only confirm that two victims had been taken to the hospital with gunshot wounds.
